short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take and manage notes on your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quick Notes is a powerful and lightweight browser extension designed to simplify your note-taking experience. Whether you’re conducting research, planning a project or just need a quick place to jot down ideas, Quick Notes provides a seamless and organised solution.

Why Choose Quick Notes?
Fast and Easy Note-Taking
Add notes instantly without leaving your current webpage. The intuitive interface allows you to focus on capturing your thoughts without unnecessary distractions.

Organised Storage
All your notes are stored securely and accessible anytime.

Integrated Accessibility
Quick Notes is designed to blend into your browsing habits. With a popup interface, it’s always just a click away—perfect for multi-taskers and professionals.

Cross-Device Sync
Save your notes with Chrome Sync. Your ideas and information are available across devices, ensuring you’re always up-to-date no matter where you are.

Customisable and User-Friendly
Features like editable notes, timestamps and the ability to delete old notes keep your workspace clean and efficient.

Secure and Private
We prioritise your privacy. Quick Notes stores your data securely and your information is never shared or sold.

Who Can Benefit from Quick Notes?
Students: Quickly capture research ideas, assignments or class notes.
Professionals: Keep track of tasks, meeting minutes or brainstorming ideas.
Casual Users: Organise shopping lists, personal reminders or creative thoughts.
Quick Notes is a versatile tool for anyone looking to stay organised and productive.

Why Install Quick Notes Today?
In today’s fast-paced digital world, having a reliable and efficient note-taking tool is essential. Quick Notes eliminates the hassle of switching apps or losing track of important ideas. It’s designed to work for you, helping you focus on what matters most.
